block.field: The surface must be smooth, plan and reflective
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : surface_property

block.field: The surface must be 1 m X 1m
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : surface_area
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. CS : OHC 2. SoS : Byzantine 3. CS : General 4. CS : Lieutenant_1 5. CS : Lieutenant_2 6. CS : Lieutenant_3

block.field: Kilobots start stationary, in square position with same distance, facing the center of the square
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Movement of G 2. State variable : Movement of L1 3. State variable : Movement of L2 4. State variable : Movement of L3

block.field: All kilobots start with White led
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Led of G 2. State variable : Led of L1 3. State variable : Led of L2 4. State variable : Led of L3
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Dynamic service : Eligibility of "General" 2. Service : Select the general
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Role of G
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Led of G

block.field: The other 3 kilobots are automatically Lieutenants
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Role of L1 2. State variable : Role of L2 3. State variable : Role of L3

block.field: Lieutenants are enumerated from 1 to 3, according with their uid, in ascending way
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : L1 id 2. State variable : L2 id 3. State variable : L3 id
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Led of L1 2. State variable : Led of L2 3. State variable : Led of L3

block.field: Traitor chosen random. Max 1 traitor of 4 kilobots
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Dynamic service : Eligibility of "Traitor" 2. Dynamic service : Eligibility of "Traitor" 3. Dynamic service : Eligibility of "Traitor" 4. Dynamic service : Eligibility of "Traitor" 5. Service : Select the traitor

block.field: Only the traitor's led is Yellow
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Led of G 2. State variable : Led of L1 3. State variable : Led of L2 4. State variable : Led of L3

block.field: Each kilobot can move inside the square on his round
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G move inside the square 2. Service : L1 move inside the square 3. Service : L2 move inside the square 4. Service : L3 move inside the square

block.field: After communicating, each kilobot comeback to his place
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G move to his place 2. Service : L1 move to his place 3. Service : L2 move to his place 4. Service : L3 move to his place
Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Round of movement

block.field: The lieutenants move theirself from lowest to highest uid
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Round of movement 2. State variable : Round of movement 3. State variable : Round of movement

block.field: The OHC send the commands to the kilobots
Each kilobot can send broadcast message
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. RUMI : General_interface 2. RUMI : Lieutenant1_interface 3. RUMI : Lieutenant2_interface 4. RUMI : Lieutenant3_interface

block.field: Each kilobot send the command: 1 attack or 2 retreat
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G send attack or retreat command 2. Service : L1 send attack or retreat command 3. Service : L2 send attack or retreat command 4. Service : L3 send attack or retreat command

block.field: Lieutenants catch only the proper command
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G receives attack or retreat command 2. Service : L2 receives attack or retreat command 3. Service : L1 receives attack or retreat command 4. Service : L3 receives attack or retreat command

block.field: General as traitor, send casual different command
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G send attack or retreat command

block.field: Lieutenants as traitor, send differrent command from the received by the general
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : L1 send attack or retreat command 2. Service : L2 send attack or retreat command 3. Service : L3 send attack or retreat command

block.field: Finally, all kilobots perform the command received in majority
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G performs goal 2. Service : L1 perform goal 3. Service : L2 perform goal 4. Service : L3 perform goal

block.field: If kilobot attacks, the led is Green
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Led of G 2. State variable : Led of L1 3. State variable : Led of L2 4. State variable : Led of L3

block.field: If kilobot attacks, it tourns around
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G tourns around 2. Service : L1 turns around 3. Service : L2 turns around 4. Service : L3 turns around

block.field: If kilobot retreats, the led is Red
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. State variable : Led of G 2. State variable : Led of L1 3. State variable : Led of L2 4. State variable : Led of L3

block.field: If kilobot retreats, it runs away from other
block.requirement: Satisfied by block(s) : -------------------------------- 1. Service : G runs away 2. Service : L1 runs away 3. Service : L2 runs away 4. Service : L3 runs away

block.field: G send attack or retreat command
G receives attack or retreat command
L1 send attack or retreat command
L1 receives attack or retreat command
L2 send attack or retreat command
L2 receives attack or retreat command
Second lowest uid between non general
L3 send attack or retreat command
L3 receives attack or retreat command
